title.narrative: Improving RMNCH+A of India’s Urban Poor (Local)

description.narrative: (India): .This activity supports private primary health care networks provide affordable primary health care, including TB care, to 10 million urban poor populations. ..With FY 20120funds this activity will: 1) provide monitoring evaluation and learning support to the pay-for-performance model on tuberculosis aimed at increasing case detection and improving treatment outcomes; and 2) connect, capacitate and catalyze innovative social enterprises focused on improving health outcomes. ..The activity will partner with healthcare businesses, innovators of healthcare technologies, insurance providers, private investors and financial institutions to addresses preventable TB among India's urban poor...Aligning with the Administration framework for ending the need for foreign assistance, this activity builds on India's progress to date providing quality services to the growing population of urban poor. This activity was designed to be impactful through collaboration with the GOI to ensure results are sustain through scale up with Indian resources. .......... .
